Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns HypervisorArn.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: Returns HypervisorArn, an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a Hypervisor. For example: arn:aws:backup-gateway:us-east-1:123456789012:hypervisor/hype-1234D67D
